definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
to cross over/to transcend/to cover distance/to overcome/to rise above
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more

sentences.english: They found that the higher their level of social interaction, the better their cognitive functioning.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现，社会交往越多的人认知表现越好。

sentences.english: The new bridge over the railroad tracks eliminated danger in cros, sing.
sentences.chinese: 这座新垮越铁轨的桥免除了越过铁轨时的危险。

sentences.english: As for the Song of tea, the tea dust finer, the higher the quality of its tea.
sentences.chinese: 而对于宋茶来说，茶末越细，其茶的品质就越高。

sentences.english: 'The longer you've known someone, the easier that conversation is, ' Dr. Epperly adds.
sentences.chinese: 艾伯利医生说，你认识病患越久，这种对话就越容易。

sentences.english: The more dye molecules there are, the more light is lost.
sentences.chinese: 当板上的色块分子越多，光线的散失就厉害。

sentences.english: We find ourselves lonely at the top.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现本身飞得越高，就会越感孤单。

sentences.english: The higher the anode is humidified , the more water will migrate from anode to cathode.
sentences.chinese: 阳极增湿程度越大，由阳极向阴极迁移的水量越多。

sentences.english: Most Zainichi remove themselves from the North Korean regime as much as they can.
sentences.chinese: 大部分在日朝鲜人使自己离朝鲜政权越远越好。

sentences.english: The more LRP5, the more the enzyme is blocked, and the less serotonin is made.
sentences.chinese: LRP5越多，越多的酶被阻滞，复合胺产生越少。

sentences.english: The larger the font size is, the easier it is for readers to actually read the text presented on a given web-page.
sentences.chinese: 字体越大，读者越容易看到呈现在网页上的内容。

sentences.english: For maximum efficiency, frequently accessed tables should have as few extents as possible.
sentences.chinese: 为达到效率最大化，频繁访问的表区段应当越少越好。

sentences.english: The closer a society's population growth rate gets to zero, the more population aging it will be.
sentences.chinese: 一个社会的人口增加率越接近零，其人口便愈老龄化。

sentences.english: Forward firing is discussed in this article only.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中主要研究了越肩发射的前射方式。

sentences.english: You eat more and more until you fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 你就会越吃越多，直到你睡去。

sentences.english: You eat more and more until you fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 你就会越吃越多，直到你睡去。

sentences.english: Braid each side, the lumpier the better.
sentences.chinese: 把每边，越多块编成辫子好。

definition: increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
